benchmark_details.name: FAIRFLOW
benchmark_details.overview: FAIRFLOW is a new debiasing framework that mitigates dataset biases in Natural Language Understanding tasks by learning to be undecided in its predictions for data samples associated with known or unknown biases.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: The primary objective of FAIRFLOW is to mitigate dataset biases in natural language understanding tasks.

data.source: Datasets used include MNLI, Quora question pairs (QQP), and gene-phenotype relation (PGR).
data.annotation: Annotations are based on standard labeling of natural language inference, paraphrase identification, and relation extraction tasks.

methodology.calculation: Metrics are calculated based on predictions against ground truth labels.
methodology.interpretation: Higher accuracy and F1 scores indicate better performance and effective debiasing.
methodology.validation: Extensive comparisons against existing debiasing models on various datasets.
